attributes.review: ✨My dog dead✨. I opened this app and then my dog heard me click the button with its supersonic hearing. And it died of disappointment 😔🖐🏾. It layed there on my floor like 👁👄👁. It’s last words were “burn the Cheeto 2020”. This app was filled with racist piece of scum. That killed my diggidy dog 😫. I cannot express how much me and my dog HATE THIS APP 🤬. 1 STAR REVIEW I HOPE APPLE TAKES THIS APP DOWN FOR MY DOGS SAKE. 😇RIP Penelope.
attributes.title: No 😡

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP I downloaded this app to keep up with the news of our President and this must be a scam! It shows fake news and glitches me out every minute! it hacked into my phone stealing valuable information and selling it! This is a big scam so save your phone!!!!
attributes.title: Glitch, Scam, and Hacks Phone!!

attributes.review: I’m still trynna figure out why you don’t like us so much and trynna take away tik tok. Is it because we played you into thinking you were going to have a lot of people at your rally? Is it because we are tying to free your son? Is it because we are trying to free your wife?
attributes.title: Dear Donald

attributes.review: The number that they give you to text to TRUMP doesn’t work or I guess it just doesn’t work with my phone. Also I don’t to vote for Trump anymore, because his policies are going against my interests and he’s conflicting with my basic human rights.
attributes.title: I’m just going to delete the app

attributes.review: Not only is Trump a garbage human being, but he also has a garbage app! Many bugs and racist propaganda, reminiscent of old day slavery and Jim Crow era racism. He demeans and views anyone that opposes him as weaker while simultaneously encouraging young, impressionable children that the best life to live is a life of hate. I’d give it a zero, but then I couldn’t write a review.
attributes.title: Racist Garbage

attributes.review: So I opened this app to see our lovely president and I had took acid so I typed my phone number on in then I saw the orange head it was floating and I could not see my president I got scared and threw my phone then I realized that I gave him a bad review whoops and deleted the app became its trash
attributes.title: Too much orange it’s my favorite color

attributes.review: This is quite possibly the worst thing on the app store. It glitches and crashes constantly. I think it put a virus on my phone because every time I try to use TikTok or Twitter it immediately closes out and crashes. I am thoroughly ✨🧚🏽‍♀️dissatisfied 🧚🏽‍♀️✨
attributes.title: Do not download this app!!

attributes.review: I was enjoying this wonderful app when I realized my pets could enjoy it too. So I took m phone to the fish and they all loved it but one. The app started flashing and gave my fish a seizure. The next thing you know he jumped out of the tank as an attempt to save himself but he suffocated 😞😔
attributes.title: This made my goldfish DIE

attributes.review: So their were these people right? And the supported trump. They had this big trump sign that looked ridiculous. And these people pulled up and was blasting f Donald trump. It started to get physical and lots of people were hurt badly. They ummm... got ran over and “unfortunately” some didn’t make it. And I’ll do it again. Vroom Vroom🤪😚
attributes.title: Deaths

attributes.review: This app is terrible. As soon as I downloaded it an avatar that resembled trump came through my phone and punched me in the face. So I restarted my phone and everything went black except all my messages began to say trump is a rapist and honestly I regret ever downloading it.
attributes.title: Black lives matter
